Producer: Tony Hernandez, John Hodges, Brooke Posch
Rating: R (Strong Nudity|Language Throughout|Drug Use|Strong Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Set in the iconic Pines, Andrew Ahn's "Fire Island" is an unapologetic, modern-day rom-com showcasing a diverse, multicultural examination of queerness and romance. Inspired by the timeless pursuits from Jane Austen's classic "Pride and Prejudice," the story centers on two best friends (Joel Kim Booster and Bowen Yang) who set out to have a legendary summer adventure with the help of cheap ros√© and their cadre of eclectic friends.
Title: Fire Island
